path.style: fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1pt; marker-start: none;
fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1pt; marker-start: none;

cc:Work.dc:description: Schematische Darstellung eines Web of Trust

rect.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(255, 153, 168); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: nonzero; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
